ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date this measure report was generated.

ivardefs.name: evaluatedResource_
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the calculation of this measure.

ivardefs.name: group_
ivardefs.desc: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this MeasureReport when it is represented in other formats or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

ivardefs.name: improvementNotation
ivardefs.desc: Whether improvement in the measure is noted by an increase or decrease in the measure score.

ivardefs.name: measure
ivardefs.desc: A reference to the Measure that was calculated to produce this report.

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: The reporting period for which the report was calculated.

ivardefs.name: reporter
ivardefs.desc: The individual, location, or organization that is reporting the data.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The MeasureReport status. No data will be available until the MeasureReport status is complete.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: Optional subject identifying the individual or individuals the report is for.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides the score for the measure for an individual member of the population; a subject-listing, which returns the list of members that meet the various criteria in the measure; a summar

properties.desc: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of the calculation of a measure; and optionally a reference to the resources involved in that calculation.
